      返回Entity的com.lss233.phoenix.entity中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Entity Entity.getBaseVehicle()
      Gets the entity vehicle that is the base of what ever stack the current entity is a part of.
      返回变量类型为Entity的类型的com.lss233.phoenix.entity中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      List<Entity> Entity.getPassengers()
      Gets the entity passenger that rides this entity, if available.
      Optional<Entity> Entity.getVehicle()
      Gets the entity vehicle that this entity is riding, if available.
      参数类型为Entity的com.lss233.phoenix.entity中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean Entity.addPassenger(Entity entity)
      Sets the passenger entity(the entity that rides this one).
      boolean Entity.hasPassenger(Entity entity)
      Checks if the given entity is a passenger.
      void Entity.removePassenger(Entity entity)
      Removes the given entity as a passenger.
      boolean Entity.setVehicle(Entity entity)
      Sets the vehicle entity(the entity that is ridden by this one).
      boolean Entity.teleport(Entity entity)
      Teleports this entity to the target Entity.
